name: Perdue Creative
description:
A creative director, design thinker and visionary leader with a proven ability to transform and build high-performing teams, and a track record of delivering complex, multi-channel projects on time and on strategy. For 20+ years, I owned and operated a successful communication design studio.
After developing a strong foundation in strategic marketing solutions and brand strategies with for-profit clients, in recent years I began focusing on corporate social responsibility, and cause marketing, as well as brand development and fundraising for nonprofit clients. My desire to make a difference for clients who make a difference led me to one of the greatest causes around—St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, where I presently serve as Sr. Director, User Experience.
